locations.name: Your Dorm Room
locations.brief_description: You are in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: You wake up in a panic in your dorm room at Chestnut Residence. Your desk is cluttered with notes, empty coffee cups. You need your USB drive, your laptop charger, your laptop and your lucky UofT mug! You should retrace your steps! You also know you can’t focus without a drink to keep you energized.

locations.name: Chestnut Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are in the lobby of Chestnut Residence.
locations.long_description: You are now in the lobby of Chestnut Residence, you see a vending machine and an exit out of the residence to go towards the campus

locations.name: Outside Chestnut
locations.brief_description: You are outside Chestnut residence
locations.long_description: Stepping outside, you are greeted by the fresh air and the sprawling campus. Paths lead in multiple directions, hinting at the adventures that await.

locations.name: Infront of Trucks
locations.brief_description: You're in front of the coffee and pink food trucks, with McLennan east of you
locations.long_description: The aroma from the food trucks fills the air as you stand in front of them. The building of McLennan to your east adds a touch of academia to the bustling scene.

locations.name: At Food Trucks
locations.brief_description: You can buy a meal
locations.long_description: You are the the best food trucks on campus, you can use a five dollars to buy a meal if you please.

locations.name: Outside Bahen
locations.brief_description: You are infront of Bahen
locations.long_description: Outside Bahen, the building’s classic architecture meets modern student life. The entrance invites you in with promises of activity and hidden secrets.

locations.name: Bahen Lobby
locations.brief_description: You are inside Bahen Lobby
locations.long_description: The Bahen Lobby is spacious and welcoming, with soft lighting and quiet corners that offer a moment of respite in a busy day.

locations.name: CSSU Lounge
locations.brief_description: You are inside CSSU Lounge, and meet Sadia, you ask her if she knows where you left your bag last class. She remembers you and says that you must answer the following question to get your bag back...
locations.long_description: You are inside CSSU Lounge, and meet Sadia, you ask her if she knows where you left your bag last class. She remembers you and says that you must answer the following question to get your bag back...

locations.name: Infront of Bahen and Mclennan
locations.brief_description: You are inside McLennan,
locations.long_description: Inside McLennan, modern design meets academic rigor. The room hums with energy as students move between classes and study sessions.

locations.name: McLennan
locations.brief_description: You are inside McLennan,
locations.long_description: Inside McLennan, modern design meets academic rigor. The room hums with energy as students move between classes and study sessions.

locations.name: West of Kings Circle
locations.brief_description: You are infront of Kings Circle, with Myhal Centre in the distant North, and the Convocation Hall is still East of you
locations.long_description: From your vantage point west of Kings Circle, you witness the dynamic interplay of historic and contemporary campus life. The area is alive with movement and possibility.

locations.name: Centre of Kings Circle
locations.brief_description: You are now directly in the centre of Kings Circle, you see University College South, and the Convocation Hall east.
locations.long_description: At the heart of Kings Circle, you find yourself surrounded by iconic campus landmarks and a vibrant atmosphere that exudes both tradition and modernity.

locations.name: Infront of Convocation Hall
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infront of Convocation Hall
locations.long_description: Before you lies the majestic Convocation Hall, its grandeur a reminder of the institution's storied past and the academic excellence it represents.

locations.name: Between University College and Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You now have University College south, and Gerstein to the west
locations.long_description: Positioned between University College and Gerstein, you stand in awe of the beautiful architecture of the campus

locations.name: Infront Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You are now directly infont of Gerstein
locations.long_description: In front of Gerstein, you are captivated by the building's stately facade and the subtle hints of its storied history.

locations.name: Gerstein
locations.brief_description: You are now inside Gerstein
locations.long_description: You are now inside Gerstein and a guard stops you! He says he remembers you from the last time that you were here, when you left a mess. You know that your charger is here, so what will you do?

locations.name: In front of University College
locations.brief_description: You are now directly in front of University College
locations.long_description: In front of University College, the historic architecture and solemn ambiance invite both awe and introspection.

locations.name: University College
locations.brief_description: You are now inside University College
locations.long_description: Inside University College, quiet corridors and elegant design combine to create an atmosphere of academic focus and heritage.

locations.name: Infront of McLennan
locations.brief_description: You have McLennan directly to the west
locations.long_description: Facing McLennan, you observe a blend of contemporary style and timeless charm, reflecting the dynamic spirit of the campus.

locations.name: Middle
locations.brief_description: You now have Sidney Smith to the East, and MyHall is far north
locations.long_description: Located at a central junction of campus landmarks, you find yourself poised between the vibrant energy of Sidney Smith and the quiet resolve of the surroundings.

locations.name: Inside of Sidney Smith
locations.brief_description: You are now directly inside of Sidney Smith, there is a secret door that requires a pass
locations.long_description: Inside Sidney Smith, you see the best coffee place on campus right as you walk in, along with a secret door. But it looks like you need some sort of pass to access it.

locations.name: In front of New College
locations.brief_description: You now have New College directly west, and Myhal Centre some distance north
locations.long_description: In front of New College, the area buzzes with activity and the promise of academic discovery, while nearby landmarks add to the campus mosaic.

locations.name: New College
locations.brief_description: You are now inside of New College.
locations.long_description: You into New College and see a student with your laptop, you need to confront him.

locations.name: Infront of New College
locations.brief_description: You now have New College directly south, and Robarts East
locations.long_description: Standing in front of New College, you are surrounded by academic vigor and the steady presence of Robarts East, each telling its own story.

locations.name: Infront of Myhal Centre
locations.brief_description: You now have Myhal Centre directly North, and Robarts East
locations.long_description: Before you, Myhal Centre stands as a testament to modern design and academic purpose, its presence both inspiring and reassuring.

locations.name: Inside Myhal Centre
locations.brief_description: You are now inside Myhal Centre
locations.long_description: You are now inside Myhal Centre, you see your bag at the front of the classroom the Sadia told you, but on closer inspection you realize that the bag is empty

locations.name: Outside Robarts
locations.brief_description: You now have Robarts directly infront of you
locations.long_description: Outside Robarts, the sleek exterior contrasts with the historic campus surroundings, evoking both modern energy and a sense of nostalgia.

locations.name: Inside Robarts
locations.brief_description: You are now inside Robarts
locations.long_description: You remember that you were at two places, the cafe and your last spot was a study table

locations.name: Study Table
locations.brief_description: You are at your old study table in Robarts.
locations.long_description: Your old study table is very cluttered with some of your work that you must've forgot and someone elses, there is someone very tired at your spot, maybe he knows something about your lost stuff, but he is in no state to answer questions.

locations.name: Robarts Café
locations.brief_description: You are in Robarts Café on the second floor.
locations.long_description: You remember stopping here for a caffeine boost. A barista is wiping down the counter. Maybe they saw your lucky mug?

locations.name: Barista Counter
locations.brief_description: You are at the counter in Robarts Café.
locations.long_description: The barista recognizes you! 'Hey, you left this behind last night.' Your lucky UofT mug is sitting behind the counter. You better take it with you! But she requires you to solve a puzzle before you leave

items.name: usb drive
items.description: Your missing USB drive, containing the only copy of your project.

items.name: backpack
items.description: Your missing backpack. It's empty :( But at least now you should be able to carry more things!

items.name: toonie
items.description: A shiny toonie. Useful for vending machines!

items.name: student id
items.description: A strangers student ID... Alex Carter... New College... Wonder what this could be used for...

items.name: notebook
items.description:
In the first semester, we would gathered as one,
First-year students filled seats left and right.
Find this place, where first-years reside.
Once you pick up, your quest's not through,
A lost ID is waiting for you.
Where should you go?

items.name: lucky mug
items.description: Your lucky UofT mug, essential for your caffeine-fueled success!

items.name: laptop charger
items.description: A borrowed laptop charger from the computer lab. This will keep your laptop from dying!

items.name: laptop
items.description: Your laptop that you used to work on your assignment! But Oh NO it's dead, you will need your laptop charger.

items.name: red bull
items.description: A Red Bull from the vending machine to help you focus.

items.name: crumpled paper
items.description:
In the most crowded study spot around,
Where pages turn and pens abound,
Go back to where you last took a seat,
A tired student you’re sure to meet.

items.name: pass
items.description: a pass that may or may not unlock a secret door at Sidney Smith

items.name: five dollars
items.description: A five dollar bill that you can use to buy something, maybe a meal

npcs.name: Tired Student
npcs.description: A tired student who looks exhausted after studying all night.
npcs.quest_complete_message: Oh my goodness. Thank you so much for the drink. Oh wait are you the guy who left your stuff here? I had your stuff put away by the barista at Robarts maybe try going to the cafe. Also I think this pass may be helpful in your search.

npcs.name: Prof. Sadia
npcs.description: Prof Sadia will help you find your bag only if you find her cat
npcs.quest_message: Oh! I recognizes you, your the one who forgot their belongings, I can help you find them if you are able to find my cat
npcs.quest_complete_message: Wow! Thank you so much for my cat! Here is this notebook, it should let you know where your belongings are

npcs.name: Security Guard
npcs.description: You ask the Security Guard at Gerstein if he knows anything about your belongings that you may have forgotten here, he says that he will only give it to you if you buy him a meal from the pink truck
npcs.quest_message: Before I can give you your belongings you must buy me a meal from the pink food truck
npcs.quest_complete_message: Thanks for the meal! Here is what I have left of your belongings... A crumpled paper, and a laptop charger

npcs.name: Alex Carter
npcs.description: A student in New College, who is looking for his ID but he also has your laptop
npcs.quest_message: Hey, I see that you now realize that I have your laptop, but I will only give it to you if you can find my student ID
npcs.quest_complete_message: Thanks so much! I will now give you your laptop. As for the rest of your belongings maybe go to Gerstein
